com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupDevice

  • public class ScupDevice
extends Object
    This class provides methods for managing the short-cut icon of this application at the device.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ScupDevice.ConnectionListener
      listener to notify changes on device

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScupDevice(Context context, ScupDevice.ConnectionListener listener)
      Creates a ScupDevice instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addShortcut()
      Adds the short-cut icon of this application at the device.
      boolean removeShortcut()
      Remove the short-cut icon of this application at the device.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScupDevice

        public ScupDevice(Context context,
          ScupDevice.ConnectionListener listener)
        Creates a ScupDevice instance.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        listener - The callback that will run
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If context or listener is null.
        See Also:
        ScupDevice.ConnectionListener

    • Method Detail

      • addShortcut

        public boolean addShortcut()
        Adds the short-cut icon of this application at the device.
        Returns:
        true If shortcut in CUP device is created successful.
        false If shortcut in CUP device is failed to create.

      • removeShortcut

        public boolean removeShortcut()
        Remove the short-cut icon of this application at the device.
        Returns:
        true If the shortcut in CUP device is removed successful.
        false If the shortcut in CUP device is failed to remove.
